holidays.title: Adivasi Divas
holidays.description: Adivasi Divas celebrates the struggle of tribes in the Indian subcontinent for better lives.

holidays.title: Annual Perseid Meteor Shower Peak Night
holidays.description: Lay on your back on your rooftop and experience the Annual Perseid Meteor Shower Peak Night.

holidays.title: Co Working Day
holidays.description: Pick a coworking space and prepare to collaborate with individuals from different but related fields.

holidays.title: International Day of The World's Indigenous People
holidays.description: Let’s sign the social contract to ensure no indigenous groups are left behind.

holidays.title: Nag Panchami
holidays.description: Let us explore the lore behind the tradition of worshiping snakes in the Hindu tradition.

holidays.title: Nagasaki Memorial Day
holidays.description: Help free the world from nuclear weapons and make it a better place for all.

holidays.title: National Hand Holding Day
holidays.description: We’re holding hands, spreading love, and showing kindness on this special day.

holidays.title: National Rice Pudding Day
holidays.description: Rice pudding is the ultimate dessert because of its versatility and health benefits.

holidays.title: National Women's Day
holidays.description: Every fight gets us one step closer to freedom and equality for women.

holidays.title: Shop Online for Groceries Day
holidays.description: Don’t move an inch, you are one click away from a checked-out grocery list!

holidays.title: Singapore National Day
holidays.description: Singapore National Day is observed to celebrate Singapore’s independence from Malaysia in 1965.

holidays.title: Suriname Indigenous People's Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate indigenous people and acknowledge how they are indispensable to the Surinamese heritage.

holidays.title: Veep Day
holidays.description: Let’s learn about the American constitution and the related presidential succession plans.

holidays.title: Alexa Bliss’s Birthday
holidays.description: This incredible wrestler has proved time and time again that it’s a woman’s world!

holidays.title: Chris Cuomo’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is no limit to the talent of this celebrated television journalist.

holidays.title: Dan Levy’s Birthday
holidays.description: He brought the character of David Rose from “Schitt’s Creek” to life and made him memorable.

holidays.title: Eugene Harris’s Birthday
holidays.description: Dr. Eugene Harris has been in the news since his appearance on the show “Married To Medicine.”

holidays.title: Rhona Mitra’s Birthday
holidays.description: Rhona Mitra is not just a multi-talented actress. Celebrate her special day right here!

holidays.title: Sam Elliott’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented award-winning actor continues to impress audiences even after so many years!

holidays.title: Troy Leigh-Anne Johnson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Troy Leigh-Anne Johnson is most recognized for her role in A.B.C's “Big Sky.”

holidays.title: Whitney Houston’s Birthday
holidays.description: Celebrate this iconic singer universally acknowledged as one of the greatest musicians of all time
